translation.text: North Central Service train #109, scheduled to arrive Antioch at 6:05 PM is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to switch problems.
The 75th St. / Grand Crossing Station is not accessible due to high standing water. Recommended alternate boarding stations are 63rd street or 79th St. / Chatham.
North Central Service train #109, scheduled to arrive Antioch at 6:05 PM is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to switch problems.

UPW Train #56, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 5:50 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference. Please listen to platform announcements for the location of your train.
MDW train #2227, scheduled to arrive Big Timber at 5:53 p.m., is operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to a switch problem.
The Grand/Cicero elevator is out of service.  Customers can use HANSON PARK or WESTERN AVENUE as alternate boarding stations.  Updates will be provided.
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
Metra will operate a Sunday/Holiday schedule on Tuesday, July 4 (Independence Day). Alcohol will be prohibited on all Metra trains.
Metra Alert BNSF - Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks.
Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks. Please use caution through the work zone and allow extra travel time.
Metra Alert ME - 79th street/Chatham Station Closure Beginning July 10 - Station Rebuild Project

The 79th street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, July 10 for approximately 7 months. During this time passengers can use 75th and 83rd street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, stations will have enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrances, lobbies with elevators, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage.  For more information click here.
Metra Alert UP-N - Metra will adjust schedule on UP-North to accommodate activities in honor of those lost in the Highland Park Shooting

Metra will be adjusting the schedule on its Union Pacific North line july 4th to accommodate activities designed to honor the memory of those who were killed in the Highland Park shooting.

The following trains will be affected:

- Inbound Train #814 will depart Waukegan 30 minutes later at 11:40 AM

- Inbound Train #816 will depart Waukegan 1 hour later at 1:10 PM

- Outbound Train #807 will depart Chicago 1 hour later at 11:35 AM.
Metra Alert - Metra trains operating on a normal schedule Monday 7/3. Trains operating on a holiday/Sunday schedule Tuesday 7/4

As a reminder, all trains are operating on a weekday schedule for Monday, July 3. In observance of Independence Day, trains will be operating on a Sunday/Holiday schedule Tuesday, July 4. Visit metra.com for schedule information.
